text.div:
This value set includes codes based on the following rules:

  • Include these codes as defined in http://loinc.org
    CodeDisplay
    9272-61 minute Apgar Score
    9274-25 minute Apgar Score
    9271-810 minute Apgar Score
  • Include these codes as defined in http://snomed.info/sct
    CodeDisplay
    443848000Apgar score at 15 minutes (observable entity)
    443849008Apgar score at 20 minutes (observable entity)

name: ApgarTiming
title: APGAR Score Timing
publisher: HL7 International - Public Health Work Group
